node.title: Fire at SkyCity convention centre contained
node.description: Crews from seven fire trucks have been dealing with a small blaze at the New Zealand International Convention Centre at SkyCity in central Auckland.
node.content:
["Crews from seven fire trucks have been dealing with a small blaze at the New Zealand International Convention Centre at SkyCity in central Auckland.", "", "
File pic Photo: RNZ / Claire Eastham-Farrelly
", "A Fire and Emergency spokesman said they were called there about 4.40pm.", "They found a small fire in a welding set and it has now been contained.", "The cause of the fire is yet to be determined.", "More than 150 firefighters fought a fire that took hold at the convention centre from 22 October 2019, after a cap sheet roll was exposed to a flame from a worker's gas torch.", "Hundreds of people were evacuated from buildings nearby, and central city streets surrounding the site were closed for days. The fire was found to be accidental.", "", "
The scene of the fire in October 2019. Photo: RNZ / Danielle Street
"]
